landing.bio: I'm an Undergraduate Junior Year Student currently undertaking a Bachelors course in Computer Science and Engineering at Vellore Institute of Technology.I'm also an active Content Creator on YouTube with 9000+ Subscribers.My primary strengths lie in my Time Management, Self-Motivation and a deep desire to learn something new.

project.pdetails: To-Do List project is an application specially built to keep track of errands or tasks that need to be done. Using MERN Stack
This is an application which provide security to web Page Authentication and all the data is store in database. Using MERN Stack

This is a portal where the students can give the examination and Teachers can assign the questions and can be evaluated based on the answers and perform CRUD operation in Database: HTML, CSS,JavaScript, PHP, and MYSQL
